reasoning: Reporting incidence of pediatric cases. Childhood medulloblastoma represents ~85% of all medulloblastomas, with incidence of ~6 per 100k in pediatric population (0-14 years), which equals ~0.5 per 100k when calculated against total population.
source: Rickert CH, Paulus W (2001). Epidemiology of central nervous system tumors in childhood and adolescence based on the new WHO classification. Childs Nerv Syst. 17:503-511
